label: 裳着
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: Like the genpuku for boys, the Putting On of the Train for well-born girls was a rite of passage symbolizing the attainment of adulthood (p. 412). [元服]
